JUDGES: András Sajó;Egidijus Kūris;Guido Raimondi;Helen Keller;Jon Fridrik Kjølbro;Nebojša Vučinić;Paul Lemmens
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The case originated in an application ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) against ORG lodged with ORG under LAW ( “ the LAW ) by NORP nationals , Mr PERSON and PERSON ( “ the applicants ” ) , on DATE .
CARDINAL . The applicants were represented by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Deputy Agent , PERSON , of ORG .

CARDINAL . The applicants alleged a violation of LAW as documents relating to the construction of both a paved sidewalk and a gravel walk along the river bank adjacent to their property in DATE were not made accessible to them . Furthermore , they complained that the new route of the path across their property was contrary to LAW .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the application was communicated to the Government .
CARDINAL . The applicants are NORP nationals , who were born in DATE and DATE respectively , and live in Alpthal in the canton of Schwyz .
